Uses of Class
gametools.Item

    • Uses of Item in gametools

      Subclasses of Item in gametools 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  Sprite
      Used to represent game objects or characters.
      Fields in gametools declared as Item 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static Item Item.UNDEFINED_ITEM
      An empty item to represent a non existent or undefined object.
      Methods in gametools that return Item 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Item Sprite.getMovementArea()
      Returns the area in which the sprite is allowed to move with the movement commands.
      static Item Tools.pti(int x1, int y1, int x2, int y2)
      Converts two points to an item object going through those locations.
      Methods in gametools with parameters of type Item 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.List<Sprite> SpriteGroup.getAllWithin(Item item)
      Returns all sprites from the group that are colliding with the specified object as a new array list.
      java.util.List<Sprite> SpriteGroup.getAllWithin(Item item, int method)
      Returns all sprites from the group that are colliding with the object (using the specified collision method) as a new array list.
      Sprite SpriteGroup.getFirstWithin(Item item)
      Returns the first sprite (in the group's default order) that is colliding with the specified object.
      Sprite SpriteGroup.getFirstWithin(Item item, int method)
      Returns the first sprite (in the group's default order) that is colliding with the object using the specified collision method.
      SpriteGroup SpriteGroup.getGroupWithin(Item item)
      Returns all sprites from the group that are colliding with the specified object as a new sprite group.
      SpriteGroup SpriteGroup.getGroupWithin(Item item, int method)
      Returns all sprites from the group that are colliding with the specified object as a new sprite group.
      boolean Item.isWithin(Item item)
      Checks if the object is colliding with another item or area using rectangular collision and touch collision as the collision testing method.
      boolean Item.isWithin(Item item, int method)
      Checks if the object is colliding with another item or area using rectangular collision and a custom collision flag.
      void Sprite.lockMovementArea(Item area)
      Defines the area the sprite can move inside.
      void SpriteGroup.removeAllWithin(Item item)
      Removes all sprites that are colliding with the specified item.
      void SpriteGroup.removeAllWithin(Item item, int method)
      Removes all sprites that are colliding with the specified item using a custom collision testing method.
      void SpriteGroup.setRemoveArea(Item area)
      Defines the area the sprites can move inside.
